price: 5. Nabii Nuuc iyyeh:yi Rabbow diggah, anu inni mara koi yaamanoonuh baraay laqó ken seeceh.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
